home.title: ELEMATT | Baby Products Designed with Love
home.description: ELEMATT creates baby products that combine safety, design, and emotion. Each product tells a unique story inspired by Elena and her friends' childhood.
home.keywords: ELEMATT, baby products, baby mat, children's products, baby design, baby safety, Elena, the fantastic 4
home.heroDescription: Baby products designed with love, safety, and a unique story
home.aboutText1: ELEMATT was born from a mother's love for her daughter Elena and her three best friends from daycare: Laia, Isabela, and Olivia.
home.aboutText2: Every product we create is inspired by their adventures, always accompanied by Pep, the stuffed elephant who became our brand's symbol.
home.productDescription: A mat that not only protects your baby but transforms your home into a magical space for play, learning, and calm.
home.feature1Desc: Superior protection that other mats can't offer
home.feature2Desc: Safe from birth, tested by independent laboratory
home.compactDesc: Ideal for bedrooms or small spaces without sacrificing comfort and safety.
home.xlDesc: Perfect for creating a spacious family play area where everyone can enjoy.
home.fantastic4Desc: Elena, Laia, Isabela, and Olivia formed a special bond at daycare. Their adventures together inspired the illustrations on our products.
home.coastalVillageDesc: Calm, tenderness, and summer. Inspired by the fantastic 4's adventures by the sea.
home.tropicalJungleDesc: Adventure, curiosity, and nature. Where Pep and Elena explore together.
home.dedication: "For my friends Laia, Isabela, and Olivia"
home.dedicationAuthor: ‚Äî Elena's dedication at the end of daycare
home.ctaDescription: Learn how ELEMATT was born and the inspiration behind each product

history.title: Our Story - ELEMATT
history.description: Discover the real story behind ELEMATT: Elena, Pep, and the fantastic 4. A story of friendship, play, and love that was born at daycare.
history.heroTitle: A Real Story Born from Play
history.heroDescription: Where every story begins on a mat
history.pepQuote: "Pep accompanies Elena on every adventure, reminding us that playing is also learning."
history.pepText1: His presence in every ELEMATT product symbolizes the tenderness, curiosity, and emotional connection we want to convey to every family.
history.pepText2: Each product tells a fragment of that story: a mat to play on, cards to discover, and a world full of love and friendship.
history.fantastic4Intro: Elena, Laia, Isabela, and Olivia formed a special bond at daycare. Their adventures together inspired the illustrations on our products.
history.dedication: "For my friends Laia, Isabela, and Olivia"
history.dedicationAuthor: ‚Äî Elena's dedication at the end of daycare
history.coastalVillageDesc: One side of our mat is inspired by the fantastic 4's adventures in a coastal village: calm, tenderness, and summer.
history.tropicalJungleDesc: The other side represents the tropical jungle: adventure, curiosity, and nature, where Pep and Elena explore together.
history.ctaDescription: Every ELEMATT product is designed with love, inspired by real stories, and created to accompany your baby's growth.
history.fantastic4Text: Elena, Laia, Isabela, and Olivia formed a special bond at daycare. Their adventures together inspired the illustrations on our products.
history.coastalText: One side of our mat is inspired by the adventures of the fantastic 4 in a coastal village: calm, tenderness, and summer.
history.jungleText: The other side represents the tropical jungle: adventure, curiosity, and nature, where Pep and Elena explore together.

contact.title: Contact - ELEMATT
contact.description: Have a question? We're here to help. Contact us and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.heroDescription: We're here to help with any questions or suggestions
contact.infoDescription: We're here to help. Write to us and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll respond soon.
contact.faqSubtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions
contact.faq1Answer: Shipping within Spain takes 2-4 business days. For international shipping, the timeframe is 5-10 business days.
contact.faq2Answer: Yes, we accept returns within 30 days of purchase. The product must be in perfect condition and unused.
contact.faq3Question: Are the products safe for babies?
contact.faq3Answer: All our products comply with European safety regulations and are certified for use from 0+ months.
contact.faq4Question: How can I care for my mat?
contact.faq4Answer: The mat can be cleaned with a damp cloth and mild soap. Do not use washing machine or harsh chemicals.

babyMat.name: Padded Foldable Baby Mat
babyMat.shortDescription: Reversible mat with exclusive watercolor illustrations. Includes 20 sensory cards. 0+ certification.
babyMat.seoTitle150: Padded Foldable Baby Mat Compact 150√ó180√ó1.5 cm | ELEMATT
babyMat.seoTitle180: Padded Foldable Baby Mat XL 180√ó200√ó1.5 cm | ELEMATT
babyMat.seoDescription150: Padded foldable baby mat 150√ó180√ó1.5 cm. Exclusive watercolor illustrations, reversible, waterproof. Includes 20 sensory cards. 0+ certification.
babyMat.seoDescription180: Padded foldable baby mat 180√ó200√ó1.5 cm. Exclusive watercolor illustrations, reversible, waterproof. Includes 20 sensory cards. 0+ certification.
babyMat.seoKeywords150: baby mat 150x180, foldable baby mat, padded mat, reversible baby mat, waterproof mat, sensory cards, ELEMATT
babyMat.seoKeywords180: baby mat 180x200, XL foldable baby mat, large padded mat, reversible baby mat, waterproof mat, sensory cards, ELEMATT
babyMat.heroDescription: Where every story begins on a mat
babyMat.storyText1: This mat was born from a mother's love for her daughter Elena and her three best friends from daycare: Laia, Isabela, and Olivia, known as "the fantastic 4".
babyMat.storyText2: Every day, these four little ones explored the world together, accompanied by Pep, Elena's stuffed elephant. Their imaginary adventures inspired the two sides of this mat:
babyMat.sideADescription: Inspired by calm days by the sea. Sand, beige, and blue tones that convey serenity and joy. Perfect for moments of tranquility and relaxed play.
babyMat.sideBDescription: A vibrant world full of adventures. Vivid colors that awaken curiosity and turn the floor into a space for exploration and learning.
babyMat.specDimensionsText150: Compact size ideal for bedrooms or small spaces
babyMat.specDimensionsText180: XL size perfect for creating a spacious family play area
babyMat.specProtectionText: Real thickness of 1.5 cm high-density XPE foam. Cushions falls and protects with every crawl, roll, and first step.
babyMat.specCertificationText: Meets EN71 standards. 100% BPA and heavy metal free. Safe from birth.
babyMat.specWaterproofText: Waterproof surface. Cleans with a damp cloth in seconds. Always ready for the next adventure.
babyMat.specReversibleText: Exclusive watercolor illustrations on both sides. Two play worlds in one mat.
babyMat.specPortableText: Includes premium PU bag with invisible zipper. Easy to store, transport, and gift.
babyMat.cardsDescription: Designed in the same artistic style as the mat, these cards stimulate imagination and become your baby's first Montessori toys.
babyMat.variantsPageSubtitle: Two worlds of adventure in one mat
babyMat.variantsPageDescription: Padded foldable baby mat. Available in 2 sizes: Compact 150√ó180 cm and XL 180√ó200 cm. Exclusive watercolor illustrations, reversible, waterproof. Includes 20 sensory cards.
babyMat.coastalVillageDescription: A peaceful seaside village where colorful houses reflect in crystal-clear water. Fishing boats, playful seagulls, and a lighthouse guiding sailors. A place where time stands still and every wave tells a story.
babyMat.tropicalJungleDescription: A lush jungle full of life and color. Toucans with bright beaks, mischievous monkeys swinging on vines, iridescent butterflies, and exotic flowers perfuming the air. A green paradise where every corner hides a new adventure.
babyMat.chooseSizeSubtitle: Two options designed to fit your space
babyMat.cardsCoastalText: 10 double-sided cards (14√ó14 cm) with coastal world illustrations
babyMat.cardsJungleText: 10 double-sided cards (14√ó14 cm) with jungle illustrations
babyMat.ctaTitle: Give your baby the best from day one
babyMat.ctaDescription: Fill your home with color, safety, and unforgettable memories.

brandSignature.text: Thank you for trusting ELEMATT. Each product is designed with love and created to accompany your family's most special moments.
